name: How Presents Are Made
description:
Join Santa on his quest to make Christmas a success - no matter what!

With Christmas fast approaching, Santa toils in his workshop as he prepares to bring the joy of Christmas to children around the world. Faced with this monumental task, he decides to seek help from a nearby elf village. He enters the village with his singular goal of toy making in mind and attempts to secure the elves’ help and save Christmas using his powers of Christmas cheer.

Controls
  • WASD -or- Up/Down/Left/Right
  • Space -or- Enter
Features
  • ~10 minutes of gameplay
  • JRPG-style battles
  • Holiday-themed environments and music
Additional Information

This game was created over the course of 1.5 weeks and submitted for the Winter 2022 Secret Santa Jam.

  • Scenario: Dylan Wright & Simon LeBlanc
  • Programming: Dylan Wright
  • Art Design: Dylan Wright, Vinny Cueva, Simon LeBlanc
  • Music: Simon LeBlanc
